definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: Palermo and rumblings of a proposal from southern city Bari followed.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫和南部城市巴里也不甘落后地表示了申办意愿。

sentences.english: Stefano Fiore sees this way the encounter against Palermo on Sunday afternoon at the Barbera .
sentences.chinese: 菲奥雷这样看待即将到来的与巴勒莫的比赛。

sentences.english: We gifted Palermo the winning goal.
sentences.chinese: 我们将制胜之球送给了巴勒莫。

sentences.english: We are not interested in Rocchi and have no Lazio players in our sights.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫曾经被报道说他们和尤文同样对罗基感兴趣。

sentences.english: They're a good team, well-organised and Milan will have to be very careful.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫是一支攻防有序的强队，米兰得小心了。

sentences.english: In other Juventus transfer deals, the Bianconeri are still negotiating with Palermo for the purchase of Andrea Barzagli.
sentences.chinese: 除了阿尔米隆，尤文还在和巴勒莫谈判收购巴尔扎利。

sentences.english: Then a one-game suspension to miss the trip to Palermo.
sentences.chinese: 然后一场禁噻使他错过了去巴勒莫的行程。

sentences.english: At that moment all the church bells in Palermo began to ring for Vespers .
sentences.chinese: 那一刻所有教堂的钟声在巴勒莫开始响丧钟。

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
Bruges (Dutch Brugge), medieval town in Belgium
Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
